Question: Planningo Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Planningo Inc.

Product: XR-Powered Media Content Creation Service at CES 2024

- Integration of AI and XR technology for capturing high-quality media content in virtual spaces
- Customizable virtual spaces for flexible and versatile media content creation
- Benefits for advertising photography and commercial videography, including reduced production times and costs
- Introduction of video production capability at CES 2024
- Democratization of high-quality media content creation for businesses of all sizes
- Versatile applications across various industries such as automotive, furniture, and cosmetics

For more information, visit www.planningo.com or contact info@planningo.com or +82 123-456-7890.
Summary_cn:
Planningo公司。

产品：2024年CES展会XR动力媒体内容创作服务

- 整合AI和XR技术，以在虚拟空间中捕捉高质量的媒体内容
- 提供可定制的虚拟空间，实现灵活多样的媒体内容创作
- 适用于广告摄影和商业录像，包括减少制作时间和成本等优点
- 在2024年CES展会上推出视频制作功能
- 使各种规模的企业都能够进行高质量的媒体内容创作
- 在汽车、家具和化妆品等各行各业有广泛应用的可能性

欲了解更多信息，请访问www.planningo.com或联系info@planningo.com或+82 123-456-7890。
